summary: Users need visibility into the status of routing configuration propagation after calling SetCurrentVersion and SetRampingVersion. This allows them to wait before starting workflows or write reliable tests.
userImpact: Users cannot reliably determine when routing configuration changes are fully propagated, making it difficult to safely start workflows or write deterministic tests.
rootCause: SetCurrentVersion and SetRampingVersion return success before routing config propagation is complete, leaving users without visibility into the actual propagation status.
proposedFix: Expose RoutingConfigUpdateState in VersionInfo to provide visibility into the routing configuration propagation status.
resolutionDetails: RoutingConfigUpdateState was exposed in VersionInfo as part of the GA versioning release.
keyQuote: Users may want visibility into the status so they can wait before starting workflows, or write reliable tests
